Articles.Content: While I'm playing it seems that when the game lags the fuel consumption between tanks offsets. Basically, when I launch fuel drains evenly but when a lag spike happens it causes the drainage to change and then the engines don't all shut down at the same time. Anyone else having this problem?
Okay, glad you worked it out, any chance you can explain what you did so others can learn from it Hiatsu2k8?
